players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "Bob, can you share who you investigated last night and what you found?"
You: "Last night, I investigated Charlie and discovered they are the mafioso."
Charlie: "I have nothing to hide and believe that trust is important for our team's success. Let us focus on working together and finding the real mafia among us."
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. I urge everyone to vote for Charlie to protect the town."
Diana: "Charlie, if you're truly innocent, why should we believe you over Bob who has detective powers?"
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
